overview: This unassuming gent bides his time posing as Bellyâ€™s VP of Business Development. Ryan dreams of living in a cilantro-free world and lives by the example of Darkwing Duck. His experience at Lightbank (the Chicago-based technology investment fund) has not only developed and refined his entrepreneurial skills, but led to his affinity for predicting extreme weather conditions in a closed office and the realization that corn is in fact a vegetable.
